explain: to be more important in value
having substances that a person or animal needs to be healthy and grow properly; promoting good health and growth
a drug to treat or cure illness
the ability to remain calm or do something for a long time
to no longer happen or exist
to cover a large area or to gradually affect
to give and receive at the same time
the act of touching or meeting someone
statement: The advantages of the plan outweigh its disadvantages.
He bought me a valuable diamond ring as a birthday present.
The food was both nutritious and delicious.
He's on medication for high blood pressure.
We seldom go to the movies.
The fire spread from the factory to the warehouse nearby.
Physical contact between a mother and child is very important.
